channel.title: Polar - Surrender (Remix Contest!)
channel.description:
I just released my new song, Surrender earlier. I liked the idea of all of these remix contests that have been a bit trendy here on the forums, so I decided to try it out. And here we are!
If you aren’t familiar with what a remix contest is, basically, al you do is remix my song with the link provided below. Post it to soundcloud, and if I like it the best, you will win (prizes below).
**Here are the rules:** **1.** You can change the song as much as you want, but you have to make sure it still resembles the original song. **2.** It must be finished and uploaded to soundcloud by October 28th (2 weeks) **3.** Remember to try your absolute best and have fun! **4.** I’ll be choosing the 3 winners by Halloween (October 31st) **5.** Post it with the art provided **6.** Post it with the name “Polar - Surrender (yourname Remix)”
**Prizes (all 3 winners will get this):** **1.** Reposted remix **2.** Added to a playlist with the other remixes
I know, not the most motivating prizes.
**Project link:** This is just a demo to avoid plagiarism. It includes all of the main and important parts of the song. It still includes every instrument. https://app.auxy.co/projects/E6zwO6K3rwWC-eeQ4VDXKQ==
**Art:** ![650DF89D-80E3-490E-B2E0-E6DD5BEB726A|500x500](upload://yZuXpCgMGWTVVBJWsjGw1QyEXNu.jpeg) (The song must be uploaded with that cover)
**Original song:** I highly suggest listening to the original song before remixing, especially if you want it to flow similarly. https://soundcloud.com/polarcooper/surrender-1

item.description:
I just released my new song, Surrender earlier. I liked the idea of all of these remix contests that have been a bit trendy here on the forums, so I decided to try it out. And here we are!

If you aren’t familiar with what a remix contest is, basically, al you do is remix my song with the link provided below. Post it to soundcloud, and if I like it the best, you will win (prizes below).

Here are the rules:
1. You can change the song as much as you want, but you have to make sure it still resembles the original song.
2. It must be finished and uploaded to soundcloud by October 28th (2 weeks)
3. Remember to try your absolute best and have fun!
4. I’ll be choosing the 3 winners by Halloween (October 31st)
5. Post it with the art provided
6. Post it with the name “Polar - Surrender (yourname Remix)”

Prizes (all 3 winners will get this):
1. Reposted remix
2. Added to a playlist with the other remixes

I know, not the most motivating prizes.

This is just a demo to avoid plagiarism. It includes all of the main and important parts of the song. It still includes every instrument. https://app.auxy.co/projects/E6zwO6K3rwWC-eeQ4VDXKQ==
